objectives.primary_objective: Learn and understand - What Causes Day and Night?
learning_outcomes: Recall basic ideas about what causes day and night?

word_list.definition: The star at the center of our solar system that gives us light and heat.
word_list.example_usage: The sun rises in the morning.

word_list.definition: A round object that moves around the Earth and we can see it at night.
word_list.example_usage: We can see the moon in the sky at night.

content_blocks.text: Today we will learn about what causes day and night?.
This lesson helps us understand what causes day and night?.
Observe the sky today and tell one thing you notice about the sun or moon.
Great! We now know some facts about what causes day and night?.
